trans-unit.source: Specifies how to read XML data and a relational schema into a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何讀取 XML 資料和關聯式結構描述至<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration when setting the `ReadMode` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當設定，請使用這個列舉型別的成員`ReadMode`參數<xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > `Auto` mode may be slower than setting XmlReadMode to an explicit option.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `Auto`模式可能會將低於 XmlReadMode 設為明確的選項。

trans-unit.source: Default.
trans-unit.target: 預設值。

trans-unit.source: Performs the most appropriate of these actions: If the data is a DiffGram, sets `XmlReadMode` to `DiffGram`.
trans-unit.target: 執行這些動作的最適當︰ 如果資料為 DiffGram，設定`XmlReadMode`至`DiffGram`。

trans-unit.source: -or- If the dataset already has a schema, or the document contains an in-line schema, sets `XmlReadMode` to `ReadSchema`.
trans-unit.target: -或-如果已有資料集的結構描述，或文件包含內嵌結構描述，設定`XmlReadMode`至`ReadSchema`。

trans-unit.source: -or- If the dataset does not already have a schema and the document does not contain an in-line schema, sets `XmlReadMode` to `InferSchema`.
trans-unit.target: -或-如果資料集並沒有結構描述文件不包含內嵌結構描述，設定`XmlReadMode`至`InferSchema`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Reads a DiffGram, applying changes from the DiffGram to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 讀取 DiffGram，從 DiffGram 來套用變更<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The semantics are identical to those of a <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Merge*> operation. As with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Merge*> operation, <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState*> values are preserved. Input to <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml*> with DiffGrams should only be obtained using the output from <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml*> as a DiffGram.
trans-unit.target: 語意都完全相同的<> *> 作業。如同<> *> 作業， <> </> *> 保留值。若要輸入<> *> 使用 DiffGrams 應該只使用取得的輸出<xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml*>為 DiffGram。</xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The target <xref:System.Data.DataSet> must have the same schema as the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> on which <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A> as DiffGram is called.
trans-unit.target: 目標<xref:System.Data.DataSet>必須具有相同結構描述<xref:System.Data.DataSet>所在<xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A>稱為 DiffGram。</xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the DiffGram merge operation fails, and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則 DiffGram 合併作業會失敗，並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Reads XML fragments, such as those generated by executing FOR XML queries, against an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 讀取 XML 片段，例如執行 FOR XML 查詢，針對 SQL Server 的執行個體所產生。

trans-unit.source: When XmlReadMode is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Fragment" name="Fragment" href=""></xref>, the default namespace is read as the inline schema.
trans-unit.target: 當 XmlReadMode 設<xref uid="langword_csharp_Fragment" name="Fragment" href=""> </xref>，預設命名空間會讀取內嵌結構描述。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Ignores any inline schema and reads data into the existing <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> schema.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何內嵌結構描述，並會將資料讀入現有<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>結構描述。

trans-unit.source: If any data does not match the existing schema, it is discarded (including data from differing namespaces defined for the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 如果任何資料不符合現有的結構描述，則會加以捨棄 (包括資料來自不同的命名空間定義<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: If the data is a DiffGram, <xref uid="langword_csharp_IgnoreSchema" name="IgnoreSchema" href=""></xref> has the same functionality as <xref uid="langword_csharp_DiffGram" name="DiffGram" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料為 DiffGram， <xref uid="langword_csharp_IgnoreSchema" name="IgnoreSchema" href=""> </xref>具有相同的功能為<xref uid="langword_csharp_DiffGram" name="DiffGram" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Ignores any inline schema, infers schema from the data and loads the data.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何內嵌結構描述、 將資料從推斷結構描述和載入資料。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> already contains a schema, the current schema is extended by adding new tables or adding columns to existing tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>已經包含結構描述、 目前的結構描述延伸藉由新增新的資料表或資料行加入現有的資料表。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the inferred table already exists but with a different namespace, or if any of the inferred columns conflict with existing columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果推斷的資料表已經存在，但是具有不同的命名空間中，會擲回例外狀況或者任何推斷的資料行與現有的資料行衝突。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Ignores any inline schema, infers a strongly typed schema from the data, and loads the data.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何內嵌結構描述、 強型別從推斷結構描述資料，並載入資料。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be inferred from the data, it is interpreted as string data.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法推斷類型的資料，則會將它解譯為字串資料。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> already contains a schema, the current schema is extended, either by adding new tables or by adding columns to existing tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>已經包含結構描述時，擴充目前的結構描述，加入新的資料表或資料行加入現有的資料表。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the inferred table already exists but with a different namespace, or if any of the inferred columns conflict with existing columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果推斷的資料表已經存在，但是具有不同的命名空間中，會擲回例外狀況或者任何推斷的資料行與現有的資料行衝突。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Reads any inline schema and loads the data.
trans-unit.target: 讀取任何內嵌結構描述，並載入資料。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> already contains schema, new tables may be added to the schema, but an exception is thrown if any tables in the inline schema already exist in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>已經包含結構描述，可能會加入新的資料表結構描述，但如果內嵌結構描述中的任何資料表存在於，會擲回例外狀況<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
